Icon.Spin.name: Spinning Weapon or Tool Ability
Icon.Spin.tooltip: Click to Toggle On / off your current Weapon or Tool
config.mode.name: Game Mode
config.mode.tooltip: Standalone = Mod works by self and doesn't use UnifiedExperienceSystem for Leveling, UnifiedExperience = If Unified Experience System Mod Exists with this mode, Spinning will require you learn the ability and so this mode also overrides config options like stamina drain and radius.
config.AbilityUses.name: Ability Uses
config.AbilityUses.tooltip: Choose if Energy or Stamina will be used for the spin ability
gmcm.openMenu.name: Open Menu
gmcm.openMenu.tooltip: Open a menu to choose a skin for your selected tool or weapon, and pick one from any mod asset folders to replace the current one.
ability.SpinningWeapon.name: Spinning Weapons
ability.SpinningWeapon.desc:
Unlocks the ability to spin your weapon or scythe by holding right click or Controller A.
Every Level: Reduce stamina cost by 10%. Even at Max Level a small amount of stamina will still be drained.
Every 5 Levels: Spin radius increased by 1.
ability.SpinningAxe.name: Spinning Axe
ability.SpinningAxe.desc:
Unlocks the ability to spin your axe by holding right click or Controller A.
Every Level: Reduce stamina cost by 10%. Even at Max Level a small amount of stamina will still be drained.
Every 5 Levels: Spin radius increased by 1.
ability.SpinningPickAxe.name: Spinning Pickaxe
ability.SpinningPickAxe.desc:
Unlocks the ability to spin your pickaxe by holding right click or Controller A.
Every Level: Reduce stamina cost by 10%. Even at Max Level a small amount of stamina will still be drained.
Every 5 Levels: Spin radius increased by 1.
ability.SpinningWateringCan.name: Spinning Watering Can
ability.SpinningWateringCan.desc:
Unlocks the ability to spin your watering can by holding right click or Controller A.
Every Level: Reduce stamina cost by 10%. Even at Max Level a small amount of stamina will still be drained.
Every 5 Levels: Spin radius increased by 1.
ability.SpinningHoe.name: Spinning Hoe
ability.SpinningHoe.desc:
Unlocks the ability to spin your hoe by holding right click or Controller A.
Every Level: Reduce stamina cost by 10%. Even at Max Level a small amount of stamina will still be drained.
Every 5 Levels: Spin radius increased by 1.
config.description: When selecting a tool or weapon, right-click {hotkey configurable} to spin, and left-click {hotkey configurable} if spin gets stuck. You can set the base stamina drain. The stamina drain reduces by 0.1 cost per skill level. Example: level 10 combat will reduce stamina drain when using weapons/tools.
hotkeys.spin.name: Spin Hotkey
hotkeys.spin.tooltip: Hold a weapon or tool and press this hotkey to use the spinning skill.
hotkeys.spin_controller.name: Spin Hotkey Controller
hotkeys.spin_controller.tooltip: Spin Hotkey for controller; holding this will spin with weapon or tool.
weapons_tools.stamina_drain.name: Stamina Drain
weapons_tools.stamina_drain.tooltip: Set how much stamina drains when spinning.
weapons_tools.spin_sprites.name: Number of Spinning Sprites
weapons_tools.spin_sprites.tooltip: Lower for better performance, higher for better quality; default = 5.
weapons.stamina_reduction.name: Reduce Stamina Drain Per Level
weapons.stamina_reduction.tooltip: Reduce stamina drain when using spinning weapons by this amount per Combat Skill level.
weapons.other_spin_radius.name: Other Weapon Base Spin Radius
weapons.other_spin_radius.tooltip: Set other weapon type base spin radius. Applies to scythes and other weapon types if used in other mods.
weapons.sword_spin_radius.name: Sword Base Spin Radius
weapons.dagger_spin_radius.name: Dagger Base Spin Radius
weapons.hammer_spin_radius.name: Hammer Base Spin Radius
weapons.damage_percent.name: All Weapon Percent Damage
weapons.damage_percent.tooltip: Set a percentage value of the weapon's base damage that should be applied to spin damage. Example: if set to 0.50, only deals 50% of weapon damage per spin.
weapons.hits_per_second.name: Weapon Spin Hits Per Second
weapons.hits_per_second.tooltip: Number of times spin attack hits monsters per second.
pickaxe.stamina_reduction.name: Reduce Stamina Drain Per Level
pickaxe.stamina_reduction.tooltip: Reduce stamina drain when using spinning pickaxe by this amount per Mining Skill level.
pickaxe.spin_radius.name: Pickaxe Base Spin Radius
pickaxe.hits_per_second.name: Pickaxe Spin Hits Per Second
pickaxe.hits_per_second.tooltip: Number of times pickaxe spin attack hits area per second.
pickaxe.radius_per_upgrade.name: Spin Radius per Tool Upgrade
pickaxe.radius_per_upgrade.tooltip: Increase the spin radius amount by this value per each tool upgrade. Only whole number increases will add an increased radius, so a 0.5 value upgrade won't add 1 additional radius unless 2 tool upgrades are done. Upgrade tool levels are: Base tool = 0, copper = 1, iron = 2, gold = 3, iridium = 4.
pickaxe.swift_bonus_hits.name: Swift Enchant Grants Bonus Hits Per Second
pickaxe.swift_bonus_hits.tooltip: Number of bonus hits the pickaxe does if it has the Swift enchant.
axe.stamina_reduction.name: Reduce Stamina Drain Per Level
axe.stamina_reduction.tooltip: Reduce stamina drain when using spinning axe by this amount per Foraging Skill level.
axe.spin_radius.name: Axe Base Spin Radius
axe.radius_per_upgrade.name: Increase Radius per Tool Upgrade
axe.radius_per_upgrade.tooltip: Increase the spin radius amount by this value per each tool upgrade. Only whole number increases will add an increased radius, so a 0.5 value upgrade won't add 1 additional radius unless 2 tool upgrades are done. Upgrade tool levels are: Base tool = 0, copper = 1, iron = 2, gold = 3, iridium = 4, and does not limit here if other mods add higher tool levels.
axe.hits_per_second.name: Axe Spin Hits Per Second
axe.hits_per_second.tooltip: Number of times axe spin attack hits area per second.
axe.swift_bonus_hits.name: Swift Enchant Grants Bonus Hits Per Second
axe.swift_bonus_hits.tooltip: Number of bonus hits the axe does if it has the Swift enchant.
watering_can.base_radius.name: Watering Can Base Radius
watering_can.radius_per_upgrade.name: Radius per Tool Upgrade
watering_can.radius_per_upgrade.tooltip: Increase the spin radius amount by this value per each tool upgrade. Only whole number increases will add an increased radius, so a 0.5 value upgrade won't add 1 additional radius unless 2 tool upgrades are done. Upgrade tool levels are: Base tool = 0, copper = 1, iron = 2, gold = 3, iridium = 4, and does not limit here if other mods add higher tool levels.
watering_can.stamina_reduction.name: Reduced Stamina Cost Per Level
watering_can.stamina_reduction.tooltip: Reduce stamina cost per level by this amount.
watering_can.reaching_bonus_radius.name: Enchant: Reaching - Add Radius
watering_can.reaching_bonus_radius.toolt: Increases the watering can's area of effect, allowing you to water a larger area at once when the Reaching enchantment is applied.
wateringcan.enchant_efficient.name: Enchant: Efficient - Reduce Stamina Cost
wateringcan.enchant_efficient.tooltip: Reduce stamina cost by this amount if the tool has the Efficient enchantment.
hoe.base_radius.name: Hoe Base Radius
hoe.radius_per_upgrade.name: Radius per Tool Upgrade
hoe.radius_per_upgrade.tooltip: Increase the spin radius amount by this value per each tool upgrade. Only whole number increases will add an increased radius, so a 0.5 value upgrade won't add 1 additional radius unless 2 tool upgrades are done. Upgrade tool levels are: Base tool = 0, copper = 1, iron = 2, gold = 3, iridium = 4, and does not limit here if other mods add higher tool levels.
hoe.reduced_stamina_per_level.name: Reduced Stamina Cost Per Level
hoe.reduced_stamina_per_level.tooltip: Reduce stamina cost per level by this amount.
hoe.enchant_reaching.name: Enchant: Reaching - Add Radius
hoe.enchant_reaching.tooltip: Increase tool radius by this amount if the tool has the Reaching enchantment.
hoe.enchant_efficient.name: Enchant: Efficient - Reduce Stamina Cost
hoe.enchant_efficient.tooltip: Reduce stamina cost by this amount if the tool has the Efficient enchantment.
hoe.enchant_swift.name: Enchant: Swift - More Hits
hoe.enchant_swift.tooltip: Tool hits more times per second if the tool has the Swift enchantment.
ModEntry.Cs-showRedMessage.SiloAreFull: Silos are full. Cannot store more hay.
